| cable chan 6 = | adsl serv 1 = | adsl chan 1 = | adsl serv 2 = | adsl chan 2 = | adsl serv 3 = | adsl chan 3 = }} ''' Disney Junior Poland''' is a television channel for preschoolers in [[Poland]]. It was presented by [[Ooh, Aah & You|Ooh and Aah]] until 2011 and doesn't screen advertising. It was launched on December 3, 2006 under the name "Playhouse Disney" as a block on [[Disney Channel Poland|Disney Channel]]. On September 1, 2010, Playhouse Disney Channel replaced a month earlier closed channel [[Jetix Play]].{{cite news| url=http://media2.pl/media/67336-playhouse-disney-od-wrzesnia-w-upc.html| title=Playhouse Disney od wrzeÅnia w UPC| accessdate=2010-08-04| author=Åukasz Szewczyk| publisher=media2.pl| date=2010-08-04}} On June 1, 2011 it was rebranded as [[Disney Junior]].{{cite news| url=http://media2.pl/media/74720-disney-junior-wkracza-do-polski.-kiedy-hd.html| title=Disney Junior wkracza do Polski. Kiedy HD?| accessdate=2011-02-10| author=Åukasz Szewczyk| publisher=media2.pl| date=2011-02-10}} ==Shows== {| style="width:65%;" |- |valign=top| '''Current''' * ''[[Art Attack]]'' * ''[[Handy Manny]]'' * ''[[Imagination Movers]]'' * ''[[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]]'' * ''[[JoJo's Circus]]'' * ''[[Jungle Junction]]'' * ''[[Lazy Town]]'' * ''[[Little Einsteins]]'' * ''[[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]]'' * ''[[Special Agent Oso]]'' * ''[[Stanley (2001 TV series)|Stanley]]'' * ''[[Timmy Time]]'' * ''[[The Hive (TV show)|The Hive]]'' * ''[[The Little Mermaid (TV series)|The Little Mermaid]]'' |valign=top| '''Former''' * ''[[Bunnytown]]'' * ''[[Walt Disney Cartoon Classics|Classic Cartoons]]'' * ''[[Higglytown Heroes]]'' * ''[[My Friends Tigger & Pooh]]'' |valgin=top| '''Coming Soon''' * ''[[Fishtronaut]]'' |} ===Movies=== * ''[[List of Little Einsteins episodes#Movies|Little Einsteins: Rocket's Firebird Rescue]]'' * ''[[Toy Story 2]]'' * ''[[Mulan II]]'' * ''[[Tarzan II]]'' * ''[[Brother Bear 2]]'' * ''[[Pocahontas (1995 film)|Pocahontas]]'' * ''[[Chicken Little (2005 film)|Chicken Little]]'' ==Broadcasting== ===Channel=== It broadcasts 24 hours a day. ===Block=== It broadcasts from 6:00 till 8:00 (weekdays) and from 6:00 till 7:30 (weekends).
